mapper.select: select m1.id m1_id, m1.name m1_name, m1.parent_id m1_parentId, m1.grade m1_grade, m1.create_date m1_createDate, m1.update_date m1_updateDate, m1.status m1_status, m1.path m1_path, m1.description m1_description, m1.icon m1_icon, m2.id m2_id, m2.name m2_name, m2.parent_id m2_parentId, m2.grade m2_grade, m2.create_date m2_createDate, m2.update_date m2_updateDate, m2.status m2_status, m2.path m2_path, m2.description m2_description, m2.icon m2_icon from management m1 left join management m2 on m2.parent_id = m1.id where m1.parent_id = 0 and (m1.id and m2.id in (select xrm.management_id from xc_role xr join xc_role_management xrm on xr.id = xrm.role_id where xr.id in (select xur.role_id from xc_user xu join xc_user_role xur on xu.id = xur.user_id where xu.id=#{id}))) order by m1.id, m2.id

select * from router where id in (select xmr.router_id from xc_management_router xmr join management ma on xmr.management_id = ma.id where ma.id in (select xrm.management_id from xc_role xr join xc_role_management xrm on xr.id = xrm.role_id where xr.id in (select xur.role_id from xc_user xu join xc_user_role xur on xu.id = xur.user_id where xu.id=#{id}))) order by id
